education.institution: UNIOESTE - University of West of Paraná

work.summary: My primary role here is to improve the User Interface and User Experience of WebApps.
highlights: Proposed and implemented Kanban on different teams. A more efficient workflow that increased productivity
Created a tool to help project managers prioritize objectives facilitating resource allocation
Trained other teams on Scrum, Kanban, AngularJs and SASS
Created a component library, standardizing UI over different projects and reducing code duplication.
Developed three big online stores. One, for the biggest supermarket of the region.
Created a reusable responsive theme to use across different online stores
Implemented secure integration with payment gateway for e-commerce.
Created portals and a e-learning platform
Designed a Joomla extension to manage online classes

work.summary: Co-creator of SIGETRANS, a system that track transit accidents
highlights: Responsible for integrating the system with the fire department, emergency care units and hospitals
Implemented a visualization tool to better convey accident reports
Wrote several white papers related to this project
